articles.author: Andrew McMurtry
articles.title: ‘I’d love to’: Warner doubles down on outburst
articles.description: David Warner has come up with a radical idea to promote accountability in umpiring in cricket, calling for the ICC to put umpiring stats on big screens at matches.
articles.content:
David Warner has come up with a radical idea to promote accountability in umpiring in cricket, calling for the ICC to put umpiring stats on big screens at matches.

articles.content:
